summary: From Earth's pollution a new monster is spawned. Hedorah, the smog monster, destroys Japan and fights Godzilla while spewing his poisonous gas to further the damage.
cast: Akira Yamauchi|Toshie Kimura|Hiroyuki Kawase|Toshio Shiba|Keiko Mari|Yoshio Yoshida|Haruo Suzuki|Yoshio Katsube|Susumu Okabe|Kentaro Watanabe|Wataru Ômae|Tadashi Okabe|Shigeo Katô|Takuya Yuki|Eisaburo Komatsu|Yukihiko Gondô|Haruo Nakazawa|Kenpachirô Satsuma|Yasuzô Ogawa|Kôji Uruki|Haruo Nakajima|Akio Kusama|Kôichi Kawakita
title: Hedora, la burbuja tóxica
